code: import axios from"axios";export var register=function register(newUser){return axios.post("/signup",newUser).then(function(response){localStorage.setItem("token",response.data.token);return response.data;});};export var login=function login(user){return axios.post("/signin",user).then(function(response){localStorage.setItem("token",response.data.token);return response.data;});};export var stats=function stats(id){return axios.post("/stats",{id:id}).then(function(response){return response.data;});};
